name: DOCS_RCVD_OBJECTS
description: High level information and metadata about received binary objects.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: OBJECT_VERSION_IDENT
columns.description: The Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) for the binary object.

columns.name: OBJECT_SET_IDENT
columns.description: The document set ID that represents a common identifier across all document revisions.

columns.name: OBJECT_EXTERNAL_TYPE
columns.description: The type assigned to the object at the sending organization.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_TYPE_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: The object's type group (I ECT 55330 value)

columns.name: OBJECT_MIME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The format used to store the object.

columns.name: OBJECT_PROV
columns.description: The name of the provider associated with the object.

columns.name: DICOM_STUDY_UID
columns.description: The Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Study Instance Unique Identifier (UID) as recorded by the image archive.

columns.name: DICOM_SERIES_UID
columns.description: The Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Series Instance Unique Identifier (UID) for the imaging series.

columns.name: DICOM_SERIES_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: The order a series occurs in a Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Study Instance

columns.name: DICOM_IMAGE_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: The order an image occurs in in a Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Series Instant

columns.name: DICOM_MODALITY
columns.description: The Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) modality type as determined by a DICOM image header.

columns.name: OBJECT_DESC
columns.description: The description for the object.

columns.name: OBJECT_CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the received object was created at the sending organization.

columns.name: OBJECT_RECEIVED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant the object was received on a query response.

columns.name: OBJECT_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant the binary data was changed for the object at the sending organization.

columns.name: CLINICALLY_RELEVANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The most clinically relevant instant for the object at the sending organization.

columns.name: LINKED_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: The event identifier for the encounter document at the sending organization to which the object is related.

columns.name: OBJECT_LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: The Care Everywhere location name for the object.

columns.name: OBJECT_LOCATION_IDENT
columns.description: The Care Everywhere location ID for the object.

columns.name: OBJECT_HOME_COMMUNITY_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the Home Community ID for the object. This item stores the Home Community ID where this object lives. This is used for IHE XDS.b and XCA  profiles.

columns.name: OBJECT_SPECIALTY
columns.description: The name of the specialty this object is associated with. The specialty listed is the department specialty from the received object.

columns.name: OBJECT_BLOB_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the object's blob type (DCS 250) if it was received in a query response.

columns.name: IMG_SLCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores how this Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) image was selected by image exchange.
